basicInformation.label: endereço
basicInformation.text: 3366 Speedway Blvd, Lincoln, AL 35096, Estados Unidos

ratingTags.tooltip: área de camping, mencionado em 29 avaliações
monster energy nascar cup series, mencionado em 9 avaliações

topComments.author: Marcus Messias
topComments.comment: Experiência inesquecível para quem gosta de automobilismo

topComments.author: Rodney LeMond Sr
topComments.comment: (Tradução do Google) Nós fomos, Este é o super autódromo de Talladega para fazer a experiência de passeio de Andretti. Meu filho andou pelos bancos altos a 180 mph em um carro de corrida! Também experimentamos o museu na pista e valeu a pena ver! As pessoas lá foram muito simpáticas e acolhedoras. O tempo estava ótimo e, no geral, foi uma experiência de corrida maravilhosa e um pedaço da história. Como Ricky Bobby disse no filme, Talladega Nights, eu quero ir rápido, e se você não é o primeiro, você é o último!  (Original) We went to, This is Talladega super speedway to do the Andretti ride experience. My son rode the high banks at 180 mph in a race car! We also experienced the museum at the track and it was well worth seeing! The people there were very friendly and accommodating. The weather was great and overall it was a wonderful racing experience, and piece of history. As Ricky Bobby said in the movie, Talladega Nights, I wanna go fast, and If you ain't first, you're last!

topComments.author: Derek Fulford
topComments.comment: (Tradução do Google) Talladega é um lugar especial. Nada como o espetáculo de 43 carros desenhando juntos em torno de uma pista de corrida de alta velocidade de 5 pistas de 2,66 milhas de largura. Americana pura. A ação na pista é incrível, mas as pessoas assistindo nas arquibancadas e ao redor das instalações são igualmente divertidas. É um ótimo lugar para se divertir. Minha pista favorita no circuito da NASCAR.  (Original) Talladega is a special place. Nothing quite like the spectacle of 43 cars drafting together around a 5 lane wide 2.66 mile high speed racetrack. Pure Americana. The action on the track is incredible, but the people watching in the stands and around the facility is just as entertaining. It’s a great place to have a great time. My personal favorite track on the NASCAR circuit.

topComments.author: Chris Mathis
topComments.comment: (Tradução do Google) Então este é Talladega. Corridas lado a lado rápidas e ótimas. Exceto que a experiência dos fãs não é a melhor. Muita caminhada e passos. Opções de passeio de cortesia limitadas e com 1 ou 2 elevadores para toda a pista não é fácil se locomover. Calçadas e banheiros sujos velhos. Não é apenas uma faixa legal. Continuo esperando por atualizações em suas instalações, pensando na próxima vez que eu voltar, eles terão feito algo para torná-lo mais agradável. Não.  (Original) So this is Talladega. Fast and Great side by side racing.  Except the fan experience is not the greatest. Lots of walking and steps. Limited courtesy ride options and with 1 or 2 elevators for the entire track it's not easy to get around. Old dirty causeways and bathrooms. It's just not a nice track. I keep waiting for updates to their facilities thinking the next time I go back they'll have done something to make it nicer. Nope.

topComments.author: Thomas Dzielak
topComments.comment: (Tradução do Google) Uau. Que experiência. Talladega é definitivamente a melhor estrada que eu já estive. O lugar era ótimo. Toneladas de banheiros. Linhas curtas. Cervejas de acesso à garagem custavam apenas US$ 4. Teve o melhor tempo. Assentos foram primeira fila na seção gasden.  (Original) Wow. What an experience. Talladega is definitely the best speedway I’ve been to. Place was great. Tons of bathrooms. Short lines. Garage access beers were only $4. Had the best time. Seats were first row in the gasden section.

topComments.author: Brandon Phillips
topComments.comment: (Tradução do Google) Estávamos neste fim de semana para o Geico 500. Tivemos uma explosão absoluta! A pista e as áreas associadas estavam limpas e organizadas. Muitos portões para fazer check-in, basicamente entramos. A experiência de garagem valeu o dinheiro.  (Original) We were this weekend for the Geico 500. We had a absolute blast! Track and associated areas were clean and organized. Lots of gates to check in through, we basically walked right in. Garage experience was worth the money.

topComments.author: Dr. Rosie Ann Riley
topComments.comment: I have always wanted to go to this Speedway. I started watching the nascar races as a young girl (now 53). Became busy as an adult and never took the time to visit until now. Every quarter they allow the general public to come to track and drive their personal vehicle around track twice for $50. You get one practice lap and 2 more so 3 total. If I am correct, the Talladega has the steepest banking at 33 degrees. Of course I didn’t know this. When we got to curve I almost panicked 😱 but I remember the gentleman saying not to. The car felt like it was almost completely side ways. The pace truck was in front to set pace. The idea was to go at least 75 to 80 in curve. The first time I drove 80 mph the 2nd and 3rd I went 90 and 95. The faster you go the better the vehicle handles. One lady said she slowed down and had to drive in the very bottom between yellow lines.  This was one of the best experiences I’ve ever had. The entire staff was very friendly and helpful. It was also open day so we had a chance to go to garage area and look around. We were given souvenirs etc. After driving most parked and talked etc.  It was a wonderful day and I highly recommended doing this if you love racing cars! Still can’t believe I drove my personal vehicle on the Talladega Speedway!!!! And no worries there are all types of vehicles; trucks, SUV’s etc.
